Package helpers

Class Algorithms

java.lang.Object
helpers.Algorithms
public class Algorithms extends Object
This class contains the algorithms used in the game.

  • Method Details

    • hasOutsideConnection

      public static boolean hasOutsideConnection(MapTile[][] map, List<Point> points)
      Checks if in the given 2D array has a ROAD type of tile on each side. Collects the ROAD type of tiles coordinates into a list.
      Parameters:
      map - The 2D array the algorithm runs on.
      points - The list where the algorithms collects ROAD type of tile coordinates.
      Returns:
      Given 2D array has ROAD type of tile on any of the edge.

    • checkPathsFromEdges

      public static boolean checkPathsFromEdges(MapTile[][] map, int[] dest)
      If there is a road on the edge of the passed 2D array this algorithm finds the shortest path from that tile to the CAMP tile.
      Parameters:
      map - The 2D array the algorithm runs on.
      Returns:
      If there is a ROAD on the edge there is a shortest path to it.

    • shortestPath

      public static List<Algorithms.Cell> shortestPath(MapTile[][] matrix, int[] start, int[] end)
      BFS algorithm that finds the shortest path in the given 2D array from the passed start and end coordinates.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The 2D array the algorithm runs on.
      start - The start coordinate.
      end - The destination coordinate.
      Returns:
      List of Cell-s which is the shortest path to the destination coordinate from the start coordinate.
